stochastic_function: lambda team_productivity: {'huge success': 0.7, 'moderate success': 0.3, 'small success': 0.0} if team_productivity == 'high' else {'huge success': 0.4, 'moderate success': 0.4, 'small success': 0.2} if team_productivity == 'neutral' else {'huge success': 0.1, 'moderate success': 0.5, 'small success': 0.4}
